doc.after: The points Pi are called control points for the BÃ©zier curve. The polygon formed by connecting the BÃ©zier points with lines, starting with P0 and finishing with Pn, is called the BÃ©zier polygon (or control polygon). The convex hull of the BÃ©zier polygon contains the BÃ©zier curve.
